channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Spotlight Social Feeds [Block, Shortcode, and Widget]
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Spotlight Social Feeds [Block, Shortcode, and Widget]

item.title: CVE-2023-0379|2024-08-02T05:10:55.649Z -- unknown -- spotlight%20social%20feeds%20%5Bblock%2C%20shortcode%2C%20and%20widget%5D
item.description: The Spotlight Social Feeds WordPress plugin before 1.4.3 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
